chart_description: The system.exit chart monitors the number of processes exiting the system. This can help pinpoint issues with processes terminating unexpectedly or identify patterns in process exits.

dimension_descriptions.do_exit: Measures the number of processes exiting due to a call to the do_exit function. This can indicate issues with individual processes or the system as a whole.
dimension_descriptions.release_task: Measures the number of processes exiting due to a release_task function call. This can indicate issues with task management and potential performance bottlenecks.
